scripts.dev:stream: sh -c 'DEV=$(ls /sys/devices/virtual/video4linux/ | head -n 1); if [ -z "$DEV" ]; then echo "Error: No virtual video devices found in /sys/devices/virtual/video4linux/"; exit 1; fi; VIDEO_DEVICE="/dev/$DEV"; node ./src/websocket_streaming.js | ffmpeg -framerate 30 -f image2pipe -vcodec mjpeg -s 940x486 -i - -pix_fmt yuv420p -f v4l2 "$VIDEO_DEVICE"'
scripts.dev: npm run dev:udp & npm run dev:stream
